title: No, world record not broken with woman giving birth to 17 babies from one pregnancy

But where did it come from?

Facebook users are posting it as if it were true, but it was originally a piece of fiction by

of a woman from Indianapolis in the US who gave birth to 17 babies in 29 hours of labour and thus “totally annihilated the former World Record for the most babies in a lone pregnancy”.

“Catherine Bridges and her husband had been trying to have a child for many years and had decided last year to use medical assistance from a fertility clinic in Rhodes Island.

“The insemination process was definitely successful, as the couple got an entire litter of seventeen beautiful and identical boys,” says the

is satirical, as it makes clear in its slogan and a disclaimer.

reads: “All characters appearing in the articles in this website – even those based on real people – are entirely fictional and any resemblance between them and any person, living, dead or undead, is purely a miracle.” –
